summary: Makes the HDR affect going from bright to darker conditions more subtle and far less distracting.
descriptionHtml:
Small mod to fix the blindness from going from a bright to dark environment. The so-called eye adjustment Bethesda decided to torture us with.

What it does not do is completely remove it, just makes it far more subtle and more realistic. It does not remove bloom affects. Does not change any light sources. It does not make nights or interiors darker.

What this mod does do is change the Eye Adapt Strength in the Imagspace's to at the most 3. And that is all it does.

If it is too subtle then dont hesitate to open my ESP and make the changes yourself to what is best for you, same with not subtle enough or gone altogether. If you dont have the CK then I guess ill hafta do it for ya lol.

Anyway, I made this as soon as the CK was released because I was sick of going blind for a second everytime I passed a torch inside a ruin, 3 or less works perfect for me and so I am sharing it with everyone. Apoligies for uploading it so late.

Sorry no images because you cant really capture the affect and no videos because Fraps is having a hissy fit on my machine. If anyone wants to upload a youtube ill post the URL in the description.

Added Dragonborn and Dawngurd support. use 1 version only, the optional files include the main.

Other mods by me:
[spoiler]
